description: ICD-10-CM diagnosis codes with MDC assignments and CC/MCC classifications

codes._comment: Common inpatient diagnoses organized by MDC

I60.00.description: Nontraumatic subarachnoid hemorrhage from unspecified carotid siphon and bifurcation

I61.0.description: Nontraumatic intracerebral hemorrhage in hemisphere, subcortical

I61.1.description: Nontraumatic intracerebral hemorrhage in hemisphere, cortical

I63.00.description: Cerebral infarction due to thrombosis of unspecified precerebral artery

I63.10.description: Cerebral infarction due to embolism of unspecified precerebral artery

G40.001.description: Localization-related (focal) (partial) idiopathic epilepsy and epileptic syndromes with seizures of localized onset, not intractable, with status epilepticus

G40.009.description: Localization-related (focal) (partial) idiopathic epilepsy and epileptic syndromes with seizures of localized onset, not intractable, without status epilepticus

J96.00.description: Acute respiratory failure, unspecified whether with hypoxia or hypercapnia

J96.20.description: Acute and chronic respiratory failure, unspecified whether with hypoxia or hypercapnia

J44.0.description: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease with acute lower respiratory infection

J44.1.description: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease with (acute) exacerbation

J45.22.description: Mild intermittent asthma with status asthmaticus

I21.01.description: ST elevation (STEMI) myocardial infarction involving left main coronary artery

I21.02.description: ST elevation (STEMI) myocardial infarction involving left anterior descending coronary artery

I21.09.description: ST elevation (STEMI) myocardial infarction involving other coronary artery of anterior wall

I21.11.description: ST elevation (STEMI) myocardial infarction involving right coronary artery

I21.19.description: ST elevation (STEMI) myocardial infarction involving other coronary artery of inferior wall

I21.21.description: ST elevation (STEMI) myocardial infarction involving left circumflex coronary artery

I21.29.description: ST elevation (STEMI) myocardial infarction involving other sites

I21.3.description: ST elevation (STEMI) myocardial infarction of unspecified site

I50.23.description: Acute on chronic systolic (congestive) heart failure

I50.33.description: Acute on chronic diastolic (congestive) heart failure

I50.41.description: Acute combined systolic (congestive) and diastolic (congestive) heart failure

I50.43.description: Acute on chronic combined systolic (congestive) and diastolic (congestive) heart failure

K55.011.description: Focal (segmental) acute (reversible) ischemia of small intestine

K55.012.description: Diffuse acute (reversible) ischemia of small intestine

K55.021.description: Focal (segmental) acute infarction of small intestine

K55.022.description: Diffuse acute infarction of small intestine

K72.00.description: Acute and subacute hepatic failure without coma

K72.01.description: Acute and subacute hepatic failure with coma

K57.00.description: Diverticulitis of small intestine with perforation and abscess without bleeding

K57.12.description: Diverticulitis of large intestine without perforation or abscess without bleeding

M80.00XA.description: Age-related osteoporosis with current pathological fracture, unspecified site, initial encounter

M84.40XA.description: Pathological fracture, unspecified site, initial encounter

E10.10.description: Type 1 diabetes mellitus with ketoacidosis without coma

E10.11.description: Type 1 diabetes mellitus with ketoacidosis with coma

E11.00.description: Type 2 diabetes mellitus with hyperosmolarity without nonketotic hyperglycemic-hyperosmolar coma (NKHHC)

E11.01.description: Type 2 diabetes mellitus with hyperosmolarity with coma

N17.0.description: Acute kidney failure with tubular necrosis

N17.1.description: Acute kidney failure with acute cortical necrosis

N17.2.description: Acute kidney failure with medullary necrosis

N39.0.description: Urinary tract infection, site not specified

A41.51.description: Sepsis due to Escherichia coli [E. coli]

A41.01.description: Sepsis due to Methicillin susceptible Staphylococcus aureus

A41.02.description: Sepsis due to Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus

J96.90.description: Respiratory failure, unspecified, unspecified whether with hypoxia or hypercapnia
